sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const AddNewDivision = ({ setInfo, setToggle, toggle }) => { const [data, setData] = useState({ divisionName: "", incharge: "", email: "", totalEmployee: "", }); const [record, setRecord] = useState([]); const handleChange = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setData({ ...data, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = () => { const newrecord = { ...data, id: new Date().getTime().toString() } setRecord([...record, newrecord]) console.log(record) setInfo(record) setData({ divisionName: "", incharge: "", email: "", totalEmployee: "", }) } useEffect(()=>{ handleSubmit(); }, [data]); return ( <>
Add New Division

Division Name

Incharge

Incharge E-mail ID

Total Employees Working

) } export default AddNewDivision
